title: Managing Schema Updates (smack down of Red-Gate vs Data Dude)
sessionTitle: Managing Schema Updates (smack down of Red-Gate vs Data Dude)
eventShortDescription: ​Best practices, SQL Compare, SQL Packager, Data Dude 2013 and SQL Deploy.
eventDescription:
​Best practices, SQL Compare, SQL Packager, Data Dude 2013 and SQL Deploy.

Nowadays everything (except Exchange of course) runs off a database. Why do so many places have a weak schema deployment strategy? In this session learn the best ways to move from one version to the next, using tools like RedGate SQL Compare, RedGate SQL Packager, Visual Studio 2015 Database Professional (aka Data Dude) and SSW SQL Deploy.
description: ​Best practices, SQL Compare, SQL Packager, Data Dude 2013 and SQL Deploy.
